title: Online Leadership Education Design: Intervention Strategies for Inclusive Access

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership principles and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Designing leadership education that reflects gender-sensitive perspectives and challenges of online learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and apply inclusive leadership models in diverse organizational settings
Learners can resolve conflict scenarios using gender-equity-based decision-making frameworks in online discussion forums
Learners can establish leadership action plans using team collaboration tools on digital platforms and incorporate feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
